data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Tylopus Jeekel, 1968, with descriptions of five new species from Thailand (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Likhitrakarn, Natdanai, Golovatch, Sergei I., Prateepasen, Rujiporn, Panha, Somsak (2010): Review of the genus Tylopus Jeekel, 1968, with descriptions of five new species from Thailand (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae). ZooKeys 72: 23-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.72.744, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.72.744
